name: Live or Die - Community Game Jam Submission
name_original: Live or Die - Community Game Jam Submission
description:
This is a short game I made for the community Game Jam hosted by YouTubers like Sykoo, Brackeys, Jabrils Ect.

Without giving too much away, it's a game where you decide who gets to live, or die based on actions they've done in their past. But be careful, only 2 things told are true!

This game is short, and hopefully won't have many bugs, but iv'e never done anything like this and i'm actually quite proud i've managed to finish a game, even if its not that good.
